body:
I'm not working with Rails on a daily basis any more, but from what I remember, `simple_format` will already return a paragraph anyways. So you could reduce this to:
```ruby
# ...
output << content_tag(:b, Application.data_label("student0_name"))
output << simple_format(application.team.students.first.name)
# etc.
```
